markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Suplex](/Feats.aspx?ID=6449) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 223 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=270)

**Prerequisites**
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6446)

**Requirements**
You have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90).

</column>

---

Flexing your entire body, you heave your opponent over your head and slam them into the ground. Make an unarmed melee Strike against the creature you have [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90). On a success, the target lands [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88), and on a critical success, the target lands prone and takes an additional 2d6 bludgeoning damage. Regardless of whether the Strike is successful, you immediately release your hold on the target.
name: Suplex
requirement: You have a creature  grabbed  or  restrained .

summary_markdown: Flexing your entire body, you heave your opponent over your head and slam them into the ground.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 4" pfs="Standard" > Suplex Single Action Source Player Core 2 pg. 223 1.1 Archetype Wrestler Prerequisites Wrestler Dedication Requirements You have a creature grabbed or restrained. --- Flexing your entire body, you heave your opponent over your head and slam them into the ground. Make an unarmed melee Strike against the creature you have grabbed or restrained. On a success, the target lands prone, and on a critical success, the target lands prone and takes an additional 2d6 bludgeoning damage. Regardless of whether the Strike is successful, you immediately release your hold on the target.
